import { useEffect } from "react"; import AOS from "aos"; import "aos/dist/aos.css"; export default function About() { useEffect(() => { AOS.init({ duration: 1000 }); }, []); return (
{/* Hero Section - No Background Image */}

About Us

Learn more about Polarix Solutions Inc. and our mission to deliver excellence in accounting and auditing services.

{/* Who We Are */}

Who are we?

Polarix Solutions Inc., an affiliate of Caballero & Associates, is a dedicated provider of auditing, bookkeeping, and taxation services. Based in Manila, we serve as an offshore extension of Caballero & Associates, a reputable CPA Company located in New Jersey, United States.

Founded by Alvin Caballero in 2018, Polarix Solutions Inc. was established with the vision of becoming a stable and integral affiliate of Caballero & Associates. Our mission is to support client growth by delivering timely, reliable, and high-quality financial services.

{/* Mission and Vision Cards - Larger */}

Mission Statement

“To provide quality, reliable, and timely auditing, bookkeeping, and taxation services to individuals and small and mid-size organizations, leveraging our expertise and commitment to excellence.”

Vision Statement

“To be the premier provider of auditing, bookkeeping, and taxation services, empowering individuals and small to mid-size organizations with unparalleled expertise and dedication.”

); }
